(This post is not about daylight savings time.)

items.content_html: That thing where your music player’s random shuffle lands on Riley’s In C. All 42 minutes of it. Yep, I have a strangely diverse music collection.
items.content_text: That thing where your music player's random shuffle lands on Riley's In C. All 42 minutes of it. Yep, I have a strangely diverse music collection.
Super Snooze Bros.

items.content_html:
Somebody at the Master lock company said ‚Äúwouldn‚Äôt it be KEWL if we did this!‚Äù without thinking that this would happen.

Sometimes things are designed the way they are for a reason. Consider before breaking the mold.

items.content_html:
As a white kid growing up in Charlottesville in the 70s and 80s, this is the sort of thing I wasn‚Äôt taught about: www.pbs.org/newshour/…

Never stop learning, even when what you learn isn‚Äôt always pleasant.
items.content_text:
As a white kid growing up in Charlottesville in the 70s and 80s, this is the sort of thing I wasn‚Äôt taught about: [www.pbs.org/newshour/...](https://www.pbs.org/newshour/arts/images-of-black-life-black-joy-are-immortalized-in-historic-charlottesville-portraits)

Never stop learning, even when what you learn isn‚Äôt always pleasant.

items.content_html:
Someone reported a bug in my software BOO!

But that means someone is using my software YAY!

But I can’t reproduce the bug BOO!

But I’m working with the person to reproduce it YAY!
items.content_text:
Someone reported a bug in my software BOO!

But that means someone is using my software YAY!

But I can't reproduce the bug BOO!

But I'm working with the person to reproduce it YAY!

items.content_html:
A lazy Saturday here, hanging out with my dog and watching some soccer.

‚öΩÔ∏è Now: Nashville v. NYCFC

The first MLS match of the Apple TV era. It’s about what I expected - neither worse than prior-year ESPN/FOX coverage, nor better.

‚öΩÔ∏è Later: DC United v. Toronto

I don’t get to matches much any more, but I’m still Black and Red. After last year, the only thing for DCU to do this year is climb out of the basement. Cautiously optimistic.

‚öΩÔ∏è Tomorrow: USMNT U17 v. Mexico

For the CONCACAF men’s U17 championship. If the US wins, we’ll hold every CONCACAF trophy for national teams, of any age or gender, playing outdoors on grass/turf. (i.e, we won’t be the champions of beach soccer or futsal.)
